statements: DELETE FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE task_id = 10 AND task_time > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyIntensiveTasks WHERE energy_consumption < 1000 AND task_type = 'Heavy Duty Task';
DELETE FROM laundry_schedule WHERE id = 101 AND task_name = 'Wash Clothes';
DELETE FROM ev_charging_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 'EV123' AND charging_station_id = 5;
DELETE FROM laundry_schedule WHERE id = 100 AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_charging WHERE charge_end_time > '2022-12-31' AND vehicle_name = 'Tesla Model S';
DELETE FROM laundry_schedule WHERE start_time <= '2022-01-01' AND end_time >= '2022-01-31';
